/bin/login
Achilterm is a lightweight UTF-8 web based terminal.
A lightweight UTF-8 web based terminal
trans-unit.target: 一个基于UTF-8的轻量级网络终端

trans-unit.source: Achilterm 0.11 require WebOb < 1.0 (use it with Python 2.5)
Achilterm 0.12 require WebOb >= 1.2 (use it with Python 2.6 and 2.7)
Achilterm 0.13 require Python 2.5 and above
Achilterm codebase from Ajaxterm by Antony Lesuisse (email: al AT udev.org), License Public Domain.
trans-unit.target: Achilterm代码库来自Ajaxterm,作者Antony Lesuisse (email:al AT udev.org),授权公共领域。

trans-unit.source: Achilterm files are released under the GNU AGPLv3 or above license.
trans-unit.target: Achilterm文件是在GNU AGPLv3或以上的许可证下发布的。

trans-unit.source: Achilterm is very simple to install on Linux, MacOS X, FreeBSD, Solaris, cygwin and any Unix that runs Python.
trans-unit.target: Achilterm 非常容易在Linux，MacOS X，FreeBSD，Solaris，cygwin和任何运行Python的Unix上安装。

trans-unit.source: Achilterm is developed by Florent Gallaire fgallaire@gmail.com.
Achilterm is initially forked from Ajaxterm which was inspired by Anyterm.
trans-unit.target: Achilterm最初是从Ajaxterm分叉出来的,Ajaxterm的灵感来自Anyterm。

trans-unit.source: Achilterm is written in Python (and some AJAX javascript for client side).
trans-unit.target: Achilterm是用Python编写的(客户端还有一些AJAX的javascript)。

trans-unit.source: Achilterm polls the server for updates with an exponentially growing timeout when the screen hasn’t changed. The timeout is also resetted as soon as a key is pressed. Anyterm blocks on a pending request and use a parallel connection for keypresses. The anyterm approch is better when there aren’t any keypress.
trans-unit.target: 当屏幕未更改时，Achilterm轮询服务器以超时方式呈指数增长的更新。按下键后，超时也将重置。Anyterm在待处理的请求上阻塞，并使用并行连接进行按键操作。没有按键时，anyterm方法会更好。

trans-unit.source: Achilterm require WebOb >= 1.0
Achilterm support Python 2.5 and above and Python 3.2 and above
Achiltermlite
Achiltermlite is a stripped-down client-side version of Achilterm.
trans-unit.target: Achiltermlite是Achilterm的一个简化的客户端版本。

trans-unit.target: 如果以root身份运行,achilterm将运行

trans-unit.source: LANG==en_US.UTF-8
License
Old versions
Older Achilterm versions only support latin1, if you use Ubuntu or any
trans-unit.target: 旧的Achilterm版本只支持latin1,如果你使用Ubuntu或任何一个

trans-unit.source: Then point your browser to this URL:
trans-unit.target: 然后将浏览器指向这个网址。

trans-unit.source: There are no partial updates, achilterm updates either all the screen or nothing. That make the code simpler and I also think it’s faster. HTTP replies are always gzencoded. When used in 80x25 mode, almost all of them are below the 1500 bytes (size of an ethernet frame) and we just replace the screen with the reply (no javascript string handling).
trans-unit.target: 没有部分更新，所有屏幕或全部都没有更新。这使代码更简单，我也认为它更快。HTTP回复始终为gzencode。在80x25模式下使用时，几乎所有字符都在1500字节（以太网帧的大小）以下，并且我们仅将屏幕替换为答复（无需javascript字符串处理）。

trans-unit.source: To install the development version from GitHub:
To install the last stable version from PyPI:
trans-unit.target: 要安装PyPI的最后一个稳定版本。

trans-unit.source: To run Achilterm after installation:
To run Achilterm from the source without installation:
trans-unit.target: 无需安装即可从源头运行Achilterm。

trans-unit.source: Using GET HTTP request seems to speed up achilterm, just click on GET in the interface, but be warned that your keystrokes might be loggued (by apache or any proxy). I usually enable it after the login.
trans-unit.target: 使用GET HTTP请求似乎可以加快achilterm的速度,只要在界面上点击GET即可,但要注意你的击键可能会被记录下来(被apache或任何代理)。我通常在登录后启用它。

trans-unit.source: Using ssl will also speed up achilterm (probably because of keepalive).
trans-unit.target: 使用ssl也会加快achilterm的速度(可能是因为keepalive)。

trans-unit.source: Website: http://fgallaire.github.io/achilterm.
